abstract: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index climbed on Monday to a level last reached nearly four years ago, with help from Apple’s latest announcement.
snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index climbed on Monday to a level last reached nearly four years ago, with help from Apple’s latest announcement.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500 advanced on Monday to the highest level since May 2008 as Apple said it would pay a dividend and buy back $10 billion of its stock.

headline.main: Apple Elevates Markets, Especially the S.&P. 500
headline.print_headline: Apple Elevates Markets, Especially the S.&P. 500
